main.name: Dona
main.bio: I am passionate about Tech. I personally believe a world with better technology,is a world with less problems. Am currently into Freelance Software Development and Tech Entrepreneurship. I do FullStack development in React,Angular,Nodejs,Expressjs,MongoDB (MERN/MEAN) when it comes to building dynamic websites. Am also into Wordpress in building some websites. I also have experience in mobile programming using React Native for Cross Platform and Kotlin/Java for Android Dev only. I know Javascript,Kotlin,Python,Php,Java and can script in any database both SQL and NOSQL based.
main.contactmessage: You can get in touch with me through the contacts below!
